summary: Build a high-converting, modern, premium marketing agency website for a digital marketing & growth agency focused on lead generation, trust/urgency, and direct contact via WhatsApp/Call/Lead Form for Dubai & Indian clients.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive layout with clear above-the-fold messaging and direct contact actions (WhatsApp/Call/Form).
Prioritize performance (fast loading) and SEO fundamentals across pages.
Use minimal text, bold headings, and smooth animations while maintaining clarity and conversion focus.
Set primary WhatsApp CTA/button href to https://wa.me/918824495515 (direct chat link).
Set Instagram social button href to https://www.instagram.com/techmarket.digital?igsh=ZTRjaTl3d255bXNw&utm_source=ig_contact_invite.
Set Facebook social button href to https://www.facebook.com/share/1CEG54jCVe/.
Deployment/hosting must use only a free plan (no payments or subscriptions) and deliver full access/ownership details to the user along with the live link.
Set the project domain/slug to: techmarket-digital (must be 5–50 chars; letters/numbers/hyphens only).

existing_features.title: Create a single-page homepage that clearly presents the digital marketing & growth agency offer using the specified sections and copy: Hero (headline/subheadline + 2 CTAs), Trust, Services (8 service cards), Why Choose Us, Results (2x–5x growth placeholders), Process (4 steps), CTA block, and Contact (lead form + contact actions).
Implement direct-contact actions: WhatsApp link/button, click-to-call link/button, and sticky WhatsApp chat button; additionally, show a sticky call button on mobile as requested.
Build and wire up the lead form so submissions are stored in the Motoko canister and the user gets a clear success/error state without leaving the page.
Apply a clean, modern, premium visual theme with dark + light contrast, bold headings, minimal text, smooth animations, and a mobile-first layout across all sections.
Ensure the site is fast-loading and SEO-optimized: semantic structure, page metadata, and performant assets.

Use confident, professional English copy with simple Hinglish flavor (light, readable phrasing) while keeping messaging results-focused and trust-oriented, and incorporate the provided CTA text examples where appropriate.
Add generated brand visuals as static assets and use them in the UI: a premium agency logo and an abstract hero background graphic consistent with the theme.

Update the site’s WhatsApp contact action so that every WhatsApp button/link (including header CTA, hero CTA, contact section button, and sticky WhatsApp floating button) opens exactly this URL: https://wa.me/918824495515

Update the website’s social media buttons so the Instagram button links to https://www.instagram.com/techmarket.digital?igsh=ZTRjaTl3d255bXNw&utm_source=ig_contact_invite and the Facebook button links to https://www.facebook.com/share/1CEG54jCVe/ (replacing any placeholder href values).
Deploy (“go live”) the latest version of the app (frontend and backend canister) to the Internet Computer so the updated social links are available on the live site.

Publish the current version of the app (frontend + backend canisters) live on the Internet Computer mainnet using only free hosting / free plan options, with no payments and no subscriptions required.

After publishing, provide the live link and full access/ownership handoff details for the deployed canisters (including all relevant canister IDs and clear steps to ensure the user has controller/admin access).

Update the deployment documentation to explicitly reflect the 'free hosting / no payments / no subscriptions' requirement and include the post-publish handoff checklist (live link, canister IDs, access/ownership verification).

Set the project domain/slug to "techmarket-digital" wherever the app’s deployment/project configuration stores the domain value, ensuring it meets the platform validation rules (5–50 chars; only letters, numbers, and hyphens).

Deploy (“push live”) the latest frontend and backend canisters to Internet Computer mainnet after the domain is set, and record the resulting live URL and canister IDs in frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md.

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage hero section with specified headline/subheadline and primary CTAs (Free Strategy Call + WhatsApp) in a clean, premium dark/light contrast style
Homepage sections: Trust (Trusted by Growing Brands), Services (icon cards), Why Choose Us, Results (2x–5x growth placeholders), Process (4 steps), CTA section, and Contact section
Contact capture and direct outreach: lead form (Name, Phone, Email, Business Type) plus prominent WhatsApp and Call actions
Sticky WhatsApp chat button and sticky Call button optimized for mobile
Mobile-first performance-focused build with fast loading, smooth animations, bold headings, minimal text, and SEO optimization
Site copy tone and CTA copy: confident, professional, simple Hinglish with results/trust emphasis and provided CTA text examples
Update the site’s WhatsApp button/link to use https://wa.me/918824495515 as the primary WhatsApp contact action
Update social media buttons: set Instagram button link to the provided Instagram profile URL and Facebook button link to the provided Facebook share URL
Publish/go-live the current version using only free hosting (no payments/subscriptions) and provide the live link plus full access/ownership details

projectName: Premium, high-converting digital marketing agency landing page with WhatsApp/Call + lead form
